column4: i just did a fresh install and everytime i go to add a ppa and key the key cant be found from server

W: GPG error: http://ppa.launchpad.net karmic Release: The following signatures couldn't be verified because the public key is not available: NO_PUBKEY 6AF0E1940624A220
what repositories have you added to your source list?. you need to add the gpg key
